Name: Zoning, 962-972 Franklin Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 230356 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 230356 ZMK (962-972 Franklin Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Franklin Ave Acquisition, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 16d, changing from an R6A District to an R8A District, and establishing within the proposed R8A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 9, Council District 35.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
